snippet.title: Rob Scallon reacts to Fretless' Demo
snippet.description:
Rob Scallon, the inspiration behind Fretless and our main character, has tried out the demo for the first time last week and his reaction was priceless!

Discover his first impressions and a few anecdotes about the game,  You might also recognize someone familiar in the video...

And don't forget to wishlist the game now on Steam: https://bit.ly/Fretless-Game
